chapter.title: AntFarm
chapter.para: AntFarm is a game about ants that are trapped in some place and need to get to the other door to escape.
Requires CMake and one of the following compilers:

listitem.para: Clang 3.3 or newer (Xcode 5.0 or newer on OS X);

chapter.para: Use CMake to build the project.

listitem.para: select the root directory of JsonBox
select the root directory of SFML
press configure and then generate Project.

chapter.para: The documentation can be found on "doc" or be generated with doxygen(it needs to be configured)
